name: PostgreSQL
description: Advanced open-source relational database with powerful features and excellent performance.
author: StumpfWorks
compose:
version: '3.8'

services:
  postgresql:
    image: postgres:16-alpine
    container_name: postgresql
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      - POSTGRES_USER={{POSTGRES_USER}}
      - POSTGRES_PASSWORD={{POSTGRES_PASSWORD}}
      - POSTGRES_DB={{POSTGRES_DB}}
      - PGDATA=/var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata
    ports:
      - "{{PORT}}:5432"
    volumes:
      - {{DATA_PATH}}:/var/lib/postgresql/data
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=postgresql"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=database"

notes: Change default password before production use
Connect using: psql -h localhost -U admin -d mydb
Consider using pgAdmin for web-based management
